featured.Name: Crop stool > 450mm
featured.Body:
The 450mm white Crop stool features detailed timber joinery including pinned bridle joints to secure the legs to the rails, turned legs, a white powder-coated aluminium seat plate and a solid timber seat.

Lead Times: This product is made-to-order and has a lead time of approximately 3-4 weeks.

featured.Name: Crop Stool > 660mm > Metal Rails
featured.Body:
One of our most popular products is now available with hollow tube steel foot rails, making them perfect for commercial applications, or areas with heavy traffic. The rails are powder coated to match the seat plate, and are available in Matte Black or Matte White.

Lead Times: This product is made-to-order and has a lead time of approximately 3-4 weeks.

featured.Name: Crop Stool > 660mm > Metal Rails
featured.Body:

featured.Name: Lucie Dining Chair
featured.Body:
Blending modern technology with the traditional craft of fine woodworking, the Lucie dining chair is a formal chair with a timeless minimal design. Featuring gentle curves and intricate joinery carved from solid timber, the Lucie dining chair is a pleasure to run your hand and eye over. 

The Lucie dining chair is proudly hand made in Australia from sustainable timbers.

Lead Times: This product is made-to-order and has a lead time of approximately 4-6 weeks.

featured.Name: Lucie Dining Chair – Upholstered
featured.Body:
Blending modern technology with the traditional craft of fine woodworking, the Lucie dining chair is a formal chair with a timeless minimal design. Featuring gentle curves and intricate joinery carved from solid timber, the Lucie dining chair is a pleasure to run your hand and eye over. 

The upholstered version of Lucie uses premium commercial grade fabrics.

The Lucie dining chair is proudly hand made in Australia from sustainable timbers.

Lead Times: This product is made-to-order and has a lead time of approximately 6-8 weeks.

featured.Name: Rebecca Lounge Chair
featured.Body:
Our new lounge chair featuring deep comfy feather down seats dressed in luxurious velvet. All wrapped in a solid exposed timber frame.

The Lucie dining chair is proudly hand made in Australia from sustainable timbers.

Lead Times: This product is made-to-order and has a lead time of approximately 6-8 weeks.

featured.Body:

Lead Times: This product is made-to-order and has a lead time of approximately 3-4 weeks.

featured.Name: Jill Bedside
featured.Body:
Introducing the Jill bedside table, the latest addition to our bedroom range. The Jill bedside features soft and delicately rounded legs, an open drawer for easy access to books, a push-to-open and soft-close drawer, closed side panels, and a beautifully dished top surface panel.

Made from solid American White Oak, and hand finished in Hard-wax oil, the Jill bedsides are a really nice functional and aesthetic piece to fall asleep next to every night.

Lead Times: This product is made-to-order and has a lead time of approximately 4-6 weeks.

featured.Name: Durer Side Table
featured.Body:
The Durer side table has a 20mm thick solid timber surface, fastened to a solid timber frame. The top has a gentle rounded chamfer on the bottom to help soften the lines and create a modern, yet slightly feminine feel. The legs of the base has a gentle round outside edge, which echoes the visual language of the top. Available in a round (and soon to be released) square version.

Lead Times: This product is made-to-order and has a lead time of approximately 3-4 weeks.

tables.Body:

tables.Name: Claire Work Desk
tables.Body:
Our Claire work desk is built on balanced proportions, softened with subtle curves in both the legs and the under-side bevel of the desk. With 3 slim-line drawers that neatly tuck away into the side rails, the Claire work desk is perfect for the home-office.

Lead Times: This product is made-to-order and has a lead time of approximately 4-6 weeks.

tables.Name: Durer Coffee Table
tables.Body:
Subtle angles combined with clean lines create this simple and contemporary range. Trestle-like legs create a warm, modern aesthetic providing functional support that will last a lifetime.

Lead Times: This product is made-to-order and has a lead time of approximately 4-5 weeks.

tables.Name: Durer Dining Table
tables.Body:
Inspired by Albrecht Durer’s monogram, this dining table features chunky angled legs with an overhanging table top. Finished with organic oils suitable for food.

Lead Times: This product is made-to-order and has a lead time of approximately 6-8 weeks.

tables.Name: Sam Dining Table
tables.Body:
Featuring solid timber construction, a large chamfer on the under-side of the table top and softened angled legs our Sam dining table is the perfect central piece for a modern living area

Lead Times: This product is made-to-order and has a lead time of approximately 6-8 weeks.

tables.Name: Sim Dining Table
tables.Body:
Featuring subtle angles and soft corners, the Sim dining table is designed to have a simple, yet beautiful aesthetic. Sim’s base has angled legs spaced towards the outer corners of the table – increasing seating capacity. The angle of the legs is echoed in a subtle chamfer on the table-top’s edges. All outer corners has a softened radius, perfect for contemporary living.

Lead Times: This product is made-to-order and has a lead time of approximately 6-8 weeks.

tables.Name: Emma Round Dining
tables.Body:
Introducing Emma – a solid American Oak round dining table. Emma features a centralised base so you can shuffle chairs around the entire perimeter of the table – without legs getting in the way.

Lead Times: This product is made-to-order and has a lead time of approximately 6-8 weeks.
